1370: Ryccie moved to Scherbier straet.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Segher at age 18 in 1370.
Gave birth to Uergina in 1370 at age 18.
1371: Gave birth to Trueb in 1371 at age 19.
1372: Gave birth to Heylewigis in 1372 at age 20.
1373: Lost son Hildebrandus when Hildebrandus was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Hildebrandus in 1373 at age 21.
1376: Gave birth to Nimme in 1376 at age 24.
Lost daughter Nimme when Nimme was 1 years old.
1379: Gave birth to Blankard in 1379 at age 27.
1380: Gave birth to Rabburgis in 1380 at age 28.
1384: Gave birth to Itsburgis in 1384 at age 32.
Lost son Trueb when Trueb was 14 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
